entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 5.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Hardy Airport 6:00 PM PST Saturday 11 March 2023

Temperature: 5.9°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 79 %

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wet snow inland overnight. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 11 March 2023
